 -  - ------------ [ -               Plot                - ] ------------ -  -

       An ambitious high school senior, Matthew (Hirsch), with dreams
       of a career in politics is overjoyed to discover that his new
       neighbor, 19-year-old Danielle (Cuthbert), is absolutely
       beautiful, and they fall in love quickly, head over heels.
       Their relationship is put to the test, however when he
       discovers (along with the rest of the town, eventually) that
       she used to be a porn star...(Olyphant plays her ex-boyfriend;
       Remar plays a skin flick producer she used to work for)
